title: Breath Mastery
description: Harnessing the power of breath for regulation, performance, and wellbeing

modules.title: The Science of Breath
modules.description: Why breath matters and how it works

modules.title: Breath for Calming
modules.description: Techniques for stress reduction and relaxation

modules.title: A Breathing Practice
modules.description: Building breath into your daily life

questions.question: What type of breathing activates the parasympathetic nervous system?
options: Slow, deep breathing with extended exhale

questions.question: What is the ideal breathing pattern for most daily activities?
options: Through the mouth, into the chest
Through the nose, into the belly, slow and light
As deeply as possible at all times

questions.question: How does breath affect emotional state?
options: It doesn't - emotions control breath, not vice versa
Breath directly influences the nervous system and emotional state
Breath only affects physical not mental states

subtitle: Your breath is the remote control for your nervous system
